body.name: Chef Knife, Ultra Sharp High Carbon Stainless Steel Chef knife set, 3-pc, 8 inch Chefs knife, 4.5 inch Utility Knife, 4 inch Paring Knife
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 42 mins
features: 1. VALUED white knife set: Kitchen Knives include 8 Inch Chef Knife, 4.5 Inch Utility Knife, 4 Inch Paring Knife. This Kitchen knife set can easily handle all your Kitchen tasks like chopping, slicing, dicing, mincing of meat, vegetables and fruit. It is truly around cooking knife.

2. RAZOR SHARP EDGE: Sharpness is key for chef Knife set. Hand-polished by craftsmen with decades of experience to ensure its durability. This Kitchen Knives hand-polished edge is 14-16 degrees per side, which is sturdy and sharp to get the job done perfectly. Rockwell hardness: 56 ± 2 HRC.

3. PREIUM STAINLESS STEEL: This knife set made by the high carbon German stainless steel 3Cr13Mov with a precise vacuum heat-treatment and nitrogen cryogenic tempering, It Features supreme sharpness, long-term durability and incredible edge retention.

4. ERGONOMICALLY HANDLE: The blade of this Chef’s knife is integrated with a soft and comfortable handle, creating the perfect grip. The ergonomic shape enables the right balance between the handle and the thin blade, it will be no shrimp, no expansion, no crack, assuring you food safety.
5. WHAT YOU GET: 8 Inch Chef Knife, 4.5 Inch utility knife, 4 Inch paring Knife. This chef knife set can be considered as the perfect gift for for mother's day, father's day, wedding and birthday.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Brand Story Little Chef originated in the United States and with production line located in China. The Little Chef products was designed by our director – Hui (Cutlery Designer). He would like to share his values and vision, passed down to people, are the real spirit of everything we do. In 2008, after four years of research, development, samples, molds and hundreds of hours of design, ideas became products and Little Chef was born. Little Chef was created from a love and passion for good design, a conversation of balance between forward thinking aesthetics that speak to the design conversations happening in the market now and the foundational, practical function needed by professional and home chefs.

Brand Story Little Chef originated in the United States and with production line located in China. The Little Chef products was designed by our director – Hui (Cutlery Designer). He would like to share his values and vision, passed down to people, are the real spirit of everything we do. In 2008, after four years of research, development, samples, molds and hundreds of hours of design, ideas became products and Little Chef was born. Little Chef was created from a love and passion for good design, a conversation of balance between forward thinking aesthetics that speak to the design conversations happening in the market now and the foundational, practical function needed by professional and home chefs.

Premium Stainless Steel Blade Made from German high-carbon stainless steel, our pro Chef knife is rust-resistant and features a strength that endures deformation even with constant use. Ergonomic ABS Handle The ergonomic construction features a non-slip surface that reduces hand tension to promote a natural movement when slicing. It comfortably fits in your both right and left hand, giving you the right balance, minimal effort, and safety when using. Hand Polishing Edge Hand sharpened to 14-16° per side in knife-edge, maintaining the perfect balance between blade sharpness and maximum resilience. Easy to peeling and slicing.

Comprehensive Knives Set Chef Knife set includes 8 Inch Chef Knife, 4.5 Inch Utility Knife, and 4 Inch paring knife. It can meet most of your kitchen needs. Keep this set handy at dinner parties or behind the bar to prepare garnishes for your favorite drinks or dishes. The entire collection is made to the highest sanitary standards and it's ideal gift for family, friends, even pro chef.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent Knives on a Budget
reviews.reviewText: These knives deliver plenty of cutting power for a budget price. We bought two sets of these knives and they are plenty sharp right out of the package. I have seen the reviews knocking the handles. Yes, they are plastic, but it's not the handles you cut with. These are great for everyday use. They are not the very highest grade of knife you can buy, but you get a lot of bang for your buck and a fair quality product.We like ours. We liked the price. Five stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A great little set of knives. I bought one for myself, my daughter and my granddaughter. They’re sturdy, they feel good in your hand and the white handles make them look very nice. Be careful though because they’re EXTREMELY sharp. I cut my finger twice the first time I used one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Precision in the Kitchen
reviews.reviewText: Rating: ★★★★☆ (4/5)The Ultra Sharp Kitchen Knife Set, consisting of three high carbon stainless steel chef knives, delivers precision and performance in the kitchen. While they excel in sharpness and functionality, there are a few considerations to keep in mind. Here's my detailed review:Impressive Sharpness: ★★★★★ (5/5)The standout feature of these knives is their impressive sharpness. They effortlessly slice through various ingredients, making meal preparation more efficient and enjoyable.High Carbon Stainless Steel: ★★★★★ (5/5)The use of high carbon stainless steel ensures durability and resistance to staining and corrosion. It's a reliable material choice for kitchen knives.Versatile Set: ★★★★★ (5/5)The inclusion of three chef knives in this set adds versatility to your kitchen arsenal. It covers a range of cutting tasks, from chopping and mincing to slicing, making it suitable for various culinary needs.Comfortable Grip: ★★★★☆ (4/5)The knives provide a comfortable grip that minimizes hand fatigue during extended use. However, some users with larger hands might find the handles a bit small.Sturdy Build: ★★★★☆ (4/5)The overall build of these knives feels sturdy and capable of withstanding regular use. Proper care and maintenance are essential to maximize their lifespan.Value for Money: ★★★★☆ (4/5)Considering the impressive sharpness, high carbon stainless steel construction, versatility, comfortable grip, and overall functionality, this Ultra Sharp Kitchen Knife Set offers good value for money. However, there is room for slight improvement in certain areas, affecting the overall rating.In conclusion, the Ultra Sharp Kitchen Knife Set provides precision and performance for your culinary endeavors. Its sharpness and versatility make it a valuable addition to any kitchen. While it offers good value for money, there are minor considerations like handle size that might affect the experience for some users. With proper care, these knives can become reliable kitchen companions for various cutting tasks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great knives for such a low price
reviews.reviewText: The knives don’t feel cheap. They are sharp and heavy enough to cut through vegetables like a premium knife

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The knives look great, and their sharp! Love them so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sharpest knives ever!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this set because I needed a new paring knife my fancy expensive set of Gordon Ramsey knives came without one. This inexpensive set has the sharpest knives I’ve ever used I was able to debone chicken thighs within minutes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Got rusty in less a few weeks.
reviews.reviewText: I liked the sharpness and ergonomic, but they got rusty too fast and therefore cannot be used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best value for the set.
reviews.reviewText: I have the set for a month now. They still stay sharp. I'm very happy.
